name: pindrop
description: PinDrop allows you to securely share files with either devices on your network, or people on the internet. It has no size limit and is completely free to use.
author: zahtec <top10webgo@gmail.com> (https://zahtec.com/)

scripts.dev: nodemon --ignore public --ext js,ts,css,html --exec 'npm run build && node --loader ts-node/esm .'
scripts.start: npm run build && uglifyjs public/index.js -c annotations=false -o public/index.js && uglifyjs public/icons.js -c -o public/icons.js && node --loader ts-node/esm .
